data.title: crunch straight leg up
instruction: Lie down on your back with your legs perpendicular to the floor and arms extended over your shoulders.
Raise your torso off the floor and take your hands towards your feet.
Hold for a while, then slowly return to the starting position and repeat.

data.title: Dragon Flag
instruction: Lie on a bench or flat surface and grab the edge with both hands above your head
Lift your legs and hips off the bench, keeping your body straight
Slowly lower your legs back down without touching the surface
